description: Shambah Dairies is a farm located in Mukarara Village, Muranga County. The primary goal of the initiative is to bring about positive change in the community through sustainable dairy farming, focusing on the production of goat milk and its various value-added products, such as yogurt and kefir. The initiative also emphasizes the importance of education and training, offering programs for farmers, students, and community groups to learn about sustainable agricultural practices and the health benefits of goat milk.
name: Shambah Dairies
